survey_name: Professional Networking Platform Feature Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the features and user experience of professional networking platforms to help improve functionality and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: Which professional networking platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Provide an 'Other' option to capture niche or regional platforms.
